author: Special Correspondent
text:
Southern Railway has announced that certain passenger trains would be temporarily augmented with four general second class and one second class – cum- luggage coaches up to February 24. This is to clear the extra rush of passengers for the Mahamaham festival.

The trains are: Tiruchi– Mayiladuthurai passenger (Train No. 56824), Mayiladuthurai – Tirunelveli passenger (Train No. 56821), train No.56812 Tiruchi – Mayiladuthurai passenger, train No. 56811 Mayiladuthurai – Tiruchi passenger, train No.56822 Tirunelveli – Mayiladuthurai passenger, train No.56823 Mayiladuthurai – Tiruchi passenger, Train No.76820 Tiruchi – Thanjavur passenger, train No.76821 Thanjavur – Tiruchi passenger, train No.76822 Tiruchi – Thanjavur passenger, train No.76826 Thanjavur – Mayiladuthurai passenger, train No.76825 Mayiladuthurai – Thanjavur passenger and train No.76829 Thanjavur – Tiruchi passenger, a press release said.
title: Trains augmented for Mahamaham
